Congressional Reports: Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

The Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities, to whom was referred the bill (H.R. 3876) to amend the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Act of 1974 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1997, 1998, 1999, and 2000; and for other purposes, having considered the same, report favorably thereon with an amendment and recommend that the bill as amended do pass.
